# Insights of Far-Seeing Taernis (Level 12 Conjurer)
## Overview
*These two books are part of a set held together with a leather strap. The covers are of a shimmering and unearthly blue leather, and the spines are built of silver and iron. The books are chilly to the touch, and staring at them induces minor vertigo.*

**Protection** *Sepia snake symbol* (Reflex DC 16)

**Opposition Schools** Divination, necromancy

**Value** 4,520 gp (6,320 gp with the preparation ritual)

**Spells**

6th—*[[Getaway (Spell)|getaway]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Planar Binding (Spell)|planar binding]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Summon Monster VI (Spell)|summon monster VI]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Wall of Iron (Spell)|wall of iron]]* <sup>S</sup>

5th—*comet* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Contact Other Plane (Spell)|contact other plane]]* <sup>OP</sup>, *pierce reality* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Teleport (Spell)|teleport]]* <sup>S</sup>

4th—*[[Acid Pit (Spell)|acid pit]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Black Tentacles (Spell)|black tentacles]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Dimensional Anchor (Spell)|dimensional anchor]]*, *[[Geas, Lesser (Spell)|lesser geas]]*, *[[Phantasmal Killer (Spell)|phantasmal killer]]*, *[[Solid Fog (Spell)|solid fog]]* <sup>S</sup>

3rd—*[[Gaseous Form (Spell)|gaseous form]]*, *[[Magic Weapon, Greater (Spell)|greater magic weapon]]*, *[[Magic Circle Against Evil (Spell)|magic circle against evil]]*, *sepia snake symbol* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Spiked Pit (Spell)|spiked pit]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Stinking Cloud (Spell)|stinking cloud]]*, *[[Tiny Hut (Spell)|tiny hut]]*

2nd—*[[Arrow Eruption (Spell)|arrow eruption]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Daze Monster (Spell)|daze monster]]*, *[[Dust of Twilight (Spell)|dust of twilight]]* <sup>S</sup>, *fantastic reach*, *[[Glitterdust (Spell)|glitterdust]]* <sup>S</sup>, *metabolize* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Shatter (Spell)|shatter]]*, *[[Stone Call (Spell)|stone call]]* <sup>S</sup>,

1st—*[[Comprehend Languages (Spell)|comprehend languages]]* <sup>OP</sup>, *[[Disguise Self (Spell)|disguise self]]*, *[[Jump (Spell)|jump]]*, *[[Mage Armor (Spell)|mage armor]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Magic Aura (Spell)|magic aura]]*, *[[Mount (Spell)|mount]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Sleep (Spell)|sleep]]*, *[[Stumble Gap (Spell)|stumble gap]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Unseen Servant (Spell)|unseen servant]]* <sup>S</sup>

**Preparation Ritual**

**Sturdy Summoning (Su)** A creature you summon gains augmented defenses for a short time. Spend this boon effect as a free action when you cast a conjuration (summoning) wizard spell. The creature you summon with that spell gains a number of temporary hit points equal to your caster level, and as long as the summoned creature has at least 1 of these hit points, it gains a +2 circumstance bonus on saving throws.

**Source:** Ultimate Magic, pg. 124
